Articles.Content:
Hi all,

When clicking the green button the KSP screen leaves fullscreen which i am then unable to resize. I have access to the bottom right of the window but the double arrow doesn't appear when i hover over the usual resize place.

Running 10.10.2

2.7 ghz intel core i5

Thank you,

Mark

Edited February 17, 2015 by markospace

I think this counts as an unimplemented feature. If there's a particular size you want KSP to be, you can edit your KSP/settings.cfg in TextEdit. Just change these two lines:

SCREEN_RESOLUTION_WIDTH = 1920
SCREEN_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT = 1080
